SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPlantController
Add Plant Controller creates plant objects and adds them to the database
AddReminderController
Add Reminder Controller creates reminder objects and adds them to the database
CarnivorousPlant
 
DatabaseInitializer
The database initializer checks if tables exist in the database And creates them if they don't User table holds user objects Plant table holds plant objects Reminder table holds reminder objects
DbHelper
The DbHelper creates connections to the database Any classes that interact with the database do so through the DbHelper
DecorativePlant
 
EditUserController
Edit User controller handles updating the user information of the logged in user Only the FirstName, LastName, SecurityQuestion and SecurityAnswer can be updated Emails are set upon registering And passwords have to be updated through UpdatePassword or ResetPassword
FertilizeReminder
 
FloweringPlant
 
FruitingPlant
 
HarvestReminder
 
Herb
 
IntegerTextField
IntegerTextField extends TextField but only accepts positive and negative integers.
LoginController
LoginController handles user login, and redirects to register or ResetPassword
MainApp
MainApp is the main entry point for Sprout Plant Tracker It check if the database tables exist and creates them if they do not It checks if the default admin user exists and creates them if they do not It then launches the login screen
ManageRemindersController
Manage Reminders Controller allows you to view all reminders in a single list and update reminder information
ManageUsersController
Manage Users is only available to Admins It allows admin users to delete other users Give admin privileges to other users Or revoke admin privileges for other users Admins cannot delete themselves Or revoke their own admin privileges
MoveReminder
 
Plant
 
PlantDAO
The Plant DAO (Database Accesss Object) holds all the methods for interacting with the plant table in the database public void addPlant(Plant plant) private String getPlantTypeString(Plant plant) public void deletePlant(String plantName) public void populateList(ObservableList data) public void populateWithPlants(ObservableList data) public static class PlantAlreadyExistsException extends Exception
PlantDAO.PlantAlreadyExistsException
 
PlantTrackerController
Plant Tracker Controller is the home screen of the Sprout plant tracking app This scene navigates to all other scenes And show a list of reminder that are upcoming or recently missed It can also display recently complete reminders
ProjUtil
ProjUtil loads properties and encrypts passwords
RegisterController
Register controller creates a new user by creating a user object and then calling UserDAO.addUser(User user)
Reminder
 
ReminderDAO
Reminder DAO (Database Access Object) holds all the methods for interacting with the reminder table in the database public int addReminder(Reminder reminder) public void markReminderComplete(int reminderId) public void updateReminder(Reminder reminder, int reminderId) private String getReminderTypeString(Reminder reminder) public void deleteReminder(int reminderId) private Reminder createReminderFromResultSet(ResultSet results) public void advanceRecurringReminder(int reminderId) public List getAllReminders() public List getPlantReminders(String plantName) public List getIncompleteReminders() public List getUpcomingIncompleteReminders(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate) public List getRecentIncompleteReminders(LocalDate endDate, int limit) public List getRecentCompleteReminders(LocalDate endDate, int limit) public static Reminder getSelectedReminder() public static void setSelectedReminder(Reminder selectedReminder) public static void clearSelectedReminder()
RepotReminder
 
ResetPasswordController
Reset Password Controller handles cases when the user forgets their password It uses their email to fetch their reminder question from the database Then check their reminder answer against the one stored (hashed) in the database If the answer matches, it checks that the two password fields match Then updates the password
SceneSwitcher
Scene switcher handles moving from one JavaFX scene to another, to avoid repetition throughout the other classes
SessionManager
Session Manager keeps track of the current logged in user with a static method
ShowAlert
ShowAlert contains the code for showing alerts, to prevent repetition throughout the other classes
UpdatePasswordController
Update Password Controller handles updating the password of a logged in user It checks that their current password matches their password stored in the database And it checks that their two new password fields match and updates the password if all of the above match
User
User objects contain all the relevant user information email, first and last name, security question and answer, password, and whether they're an admin
UserDAO
UserDAO (Database Access Object) contains all the methods for creating, updating, and accessing user objects in the database public void addUser(User user) public User getUser(String email) public void deleteUser(String email) public void updatePassword(String email, String newPassword) public void updateUserInfo(String email, String firstName, String lastName, String securityQuestion, String securityAnswer) public void createDefaultAdminUser() private boolean adminUserExists(Connection conn, String username) public ObservableList getAllUsersWithAdminStatus() public void updateUserAdminStatus(String email, boolean isAdmin) public static class UserAlreadyExistsException extends Exception
UserDAO.UserAlreadyExistsException
 
Vegetable
 
ViewPlantsController
View Plants Controller allows you to view and edit all plant objects
WaterReminder
